item.description:
It's time for a comedy, and Crazy, Stupid, Love should fill the bill. Steve Carell, Julianne Moore, Ryan Gosling (he was great in Lars and the Real Girl), Marisa Tomei -- this movie has so much going for it. And the trailer is funny. You can catch it at the theater's website: http://somervilletheatreonline.com/

I will purchase my ticket at around 7:00 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby for about 15 minutes, between 7:00 and 7:15 p.m. Look for me and the bright red backpack. At about 7:15, I will move into the theater autditorium (I like to see the previews). You can find me in the auditorium if you are late. The movie starts at 7:30 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event.

Thanks! See you Thursday!

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me and my bright red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Crazy, Stupid, Love
